docs.snippet: A northern Michigan police officer has been suspended with pay after he was seen off-duty driving a pickup truck bearing a Confederate flag around a group protesting Republican Donald Trump's election as president....
docs.lead_paragraph: A northern Michigan police officer has been suspended with pay after he was seen off-duty driving a pickup truck bearing a Confederate flag around a group protesting Republican Donald Trump's election as president.

headline.main: Police Officer Suspended After Driving With Confederate Flag
headline.print_headline: Police Officer Suspended After Driving With Confederate Flag

docs.snippet: President-elect Donald Trump's decision to empower his running mate Mike Pence to steer the presidential transition gives the soon-to-be vice president a powerful hand in shaping the incoming government and could foreshadow that he will play an ou...
docs.lead_paragraph: President-elect Donald Trump's decision to empower his running mate Mike Pence to steer the presidential transition gives the soon-to-be vice president a powerful hand in shaping the incoming government and could foreshadow that he will play an outsized role in the White House.

headline.main: Pence's Transition Job Could Signal Key Role in White House
headline.print_headline: Pence's Transition Job Could Signal Key Role in White House

docs.snippet: Former New Mexico Gov. Gary Johnson says he has no regrets about running for president for the second time and finishing a distant runner-up as a Libertarian candidate....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former New Mexico Gov. Gary Johnson says he has no regrets about running for president for the second time and finishing a distant runner-up as a Libertarian candidate.

headline.main: Ex-New Mexico Governor's Next Challenge Is a Bicycle Trip
headline.print_headline: Ex-New Mexico Governor's Next Challenge Is a Bicycle Trip
